segments.text: Good morning . Can I use my cellular phone during this time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , you can use your cell phone during the boarding process until the aircraft door is closed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . What should I do if I want to phone my family during the flight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The aircraft is equipped with onboard phones . They do not interfere with the communication and navigation of the aircraft .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So I can use the onboard phone during the flight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . They will be used at anytime before or during flight .
segments.speaker: S1
